name: smart_home_energy_manager_launchio
description: Real-World Impact: Energy management is a critical global challenge, with households seeking cost-effective and eco-friendly solutions. Innovative Use of IO Intelligence: Leverages the Models API for predictive analytics and the Agents API for autonomous decision-making and IoT integration. Scalability: Applicable to individual homes, apartment complexes, or even microgrids, with potential for broader adoption. User Appeal: Combines practicality (cost savings) with innovation (AI-driven automation and renewable energy integration).

scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
